cmek001.name: Atlas Dominator
cmek001.description: A towering war machine, designed to withstand entire armies and unleash devastating long-range bombardments.

cmek002.name: Leviathan Warlord
cmek002.description: A battlefield colossus, armed with experimental energy weapons and a fortress-grade armor chassis.

cmek003.name: Titanus Annihilator
cmek003.description: A slow-moving harbinger of destruction, wielding unstoppable firepower and impervious shielding.

cmek004.name: Oblivion Sentinel
cmek004.description: A legendary defensive platform, built to control entire battlefields with overwhelming resilience.

cmek005.name: Doom Bringer
cmek005.description: A slow-moving titan of war, designed to break enemy lines with unrelenting force and unmatched endurance.
